title: A1369 3 beeps but no boot
message:
I have a 2011 A1369 which beeps 3 times the waits then beeps 3 times, but it won't boot.
Is this a RAM issue, and if so is it possible to repair?

title: A1369 3 beeps but no boot
message:
Use quality flux and reflow RAM chips.
Any history available?

title: A1369 3 beeps but no boot
message: RAM or CPU. Definitely a time waster
